challenge.option3: c. is technically the same as an ion.

challenge.question: The main problem with bar-graph meters is the fact that
challenge.option1: a. they are not very sensitive.
challenge.option3: c. they cannot give very precise readings.
challenge.option4: d. you need special training to read them.
